subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ win over the Pacers, on Carmelo Anthony’s shot with 4.9 seconds left, improved their record to 42-38. With one more win, they will clinch the Eastern Conference’s sixth seed.
snippet: The Knicks’ win over the Pacers, on Carmelo Anthony’s shot with 4.9 seconds left, improved their record to 42-38. With one more win, they will clinch the Eastern Conference’s sixth seed.
